an4.262:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nalam arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an4.262:1.3: Kamavitakkena, byapadavitakkena, vihimsavitakkena, duppanno hoti jalo elamugo—
an4.262:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nalam arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an4.262:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an4.262:2.3: Nekkhammavitakkena, abyapadavitakkena, avihimsavitakkena, pannava hoti ajalo anelamugo—
an4.262:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitun”ti.
